result.title: Why codeforces do not have problems topic\category wise ?
result.content: I started using codeforces 3 weeks ago and i am loving it . the only problem i am facing is finding problems according to my skill set. i know there are tags to every problem in problem set but it is difficult to find and search any particular topic . For example , i recently learned dfs , bfs , bipertite graphs and want to solve problems involving those topics . it would be prettier to have categories just like hackerrank has . one thing more , why there are multiple tags on single problems . if it means that problems is solvable with different methods then there should be tutorials or solutions according to those tags so that a newbie like me could learn different approaches to a single problem . Any suggestions and advice will be appreciated thanks :)
